title.rendered: INVITATION FROM THE ENGLISH SPEAKING UNION

content.rendered:
Dear Friends,

We are delighted  to confirm our dinner-debate with:

Professor Vernon Bogdanor

It is a great privilege to welcome the outstanding Professor of Government at King’s College London, formerly Professor of Government at Oxford University. After publishing books which include Beyond Brexit: Towards a British Constitution, in 2019, and Britain and Europe in a Troubled World, in 2020, Vernon has written Politics and Power before the First World War: The Strange Survival of Liberal Britain(2022). He will talk about:
  
How to choose a political Leader in the United Kingdom

A timely subject after the election of the Leader of the Conservative party following the resignation of Boris Johnson. Liz Truss was elected by a short majority of members against her opponent Rishi Sunak who was the favorite candidate of the Conservative Members of Parliament in the Commons.

Once again Senator Joëlle GARRIAUD-MAYLAM has kindly accepted to host the ESU dinner at the Restaurant du Sénat:
Palais du Luxembourg
15 ter rue de Vaugirard, 75006 Paris
Monday 14 November 2022 at 7 pm

We will meet at 6.30 pm, with our ID papers.
We are looking forward to meeting you again and hope you will come with friends. Answers requested before 7 November 2022, as we are required to send the list of participants to the Sénat.
Luce Loussouarn President of the ESU Paris branch

Participation 60 € per person
Send the tag with your cheque payable to ESU Paris before November 7 to:
Luce LOUSSOUARN 8 Villa de Ségur 75007 Paris
